feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 5 stages: D, R, I, V, E.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission clearly describes a working financial application: it ingests ticker data, uses minute/15‑minute/hour candlesticks plus news, merges/cleans data, and outputs trade recommendations via Telegram. The Discover description and the Implement demonstration together show the tool performs financial tasks as required.
- Integrate AI: The submission demonstrates a coherent AI integration pipeline (multi-timescale price data + news sentiment → cleaning/merge → AI agent opinion) and a working example delivering recommendations in Telegram, showing the AI adds value beyond superficial use. The described implementation and demo satisfy the requirement for effective AI integration.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "It's mainly meant for day traders. So I built an AI agent that helps you um make decision on whether you want to trade or not on a certain stock."

"So all we're going to do is take the last 100 minutes um the last 115 and then the last 100 hours and then once we have all that we're going to combine it with um recent stock um news articles for the past day..."

"For example, if we go to Telegram. So I've already did an example of Tesla. So if we do Apple and execute work, it's going to run through here... you get a notification send your workflow executed succfully and you go on telegram and it will tell you here. So basically it's recommend uh recommendations to buy the entry price... and 269 stop loss here and there's your exit and your hold and exit decision as well is to hold."
criteria.driver_alignment: DISCOVER — student describes a finance-focused AI agent for day traders and its intended output (trade decisions). IMPLEMENT — student demonstrates running the tool via Telegram, processing market and news data, and producing entry/stop/exit recommendations.
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly describes a working financial application: it ingests ticker data, uses minute/15‑minute/hour candlesticks plus news, merges/cleans data, and outputs trade recommendations via Telegram. The Discover description and the Implement demonstration together show the tool performs financial tasks as required.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "My AI agent tool that I built for this assignment is to give you guys an overview is um it is simple and useful, easy to use. ... It's mainly meant for day traders. So I built an AI agent that helps you um make decision on whether you want to trade or not on a certain stock."

"All we're going to do is take the last 100 minutes um the last 115 and then the last 100 hours and then once we have all that we're going to combine it with um recent stock um news articles for the past day ... After all that's done is we're going to clean up all this data and this AI message model as well. We're going to all clean it up and then we're going to um merge merge the two data sources and then we're going to aggregate it and then send it over to an an AI agent which is going to help us form the final trade opinion."

"For example, if we go to Telegram. So I've already did an example of Tesla. So if we do Apple and execute work, it's going to run through here... you get a notification send your workflow executed succfully and you go on telegram and it will tell you here. So basically it's recommend uh recommendations to buy the entry price ... stop loss ... your hold and exit decision as well is to hold."
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: Describes the AI agent purpose (day-trader decision support) and planned data-driven approach.  
- Implement: Shows concrete implementation steps (data collection windows, news sentiment, cleaning/merging, sending to AI agent) and a working demo via Telegram producing actionable recommendations.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates a coherent AI integration pipeline (multi-timescale price data + news sentiment → cleaning/merge → AI agent opinion) and a working example delivering recommendations in Telegram, showing the AI adds value beyond superficial use. The described implementation and demo satisfy the requirement for effective AI integration.
